function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on blockchain for data control and access","Impact":"Loss of control over medical data, potential privacy breaches","Mitigation":"Implement backup data control and access methods outside of blockchain","Technologies":"Decentralized data storage, encryption algorithms","People":"Patients, medical professionals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, blockchain developers"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of IoT data collection system to cyber attacks","Impact":"Unauthorized access to sensitive medical data, data breaches","Mitigation":"Implement robust cybersecurity measures, regular security audits","Technologies":"IoT security protocols, encryption, intrusion detection systems","People":"Patients, medical professionals, IoT technicians","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, IoT service providers"},{"Description":"Risk of inadequate data delivery through Web Services","Impact":"Delayed or incomplete delivery of medical data to interested parties","Mitigation":"Implement redundancy and error-checking mechanisms in data delivery","Technologies":"Web Services, data validation algorithms","People":"Patients, medical professionals, data recipients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, data service providers"}]}
